name: ripple-lib

scripts.compile: mkdir -p dist/npm/common/js && cp -r src/common/js/ dist/npm/common/js/ && mkdir -p dist/npm/common && cp -r src/common/schemas dist/npm/common/ && tsc --build
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run build
